Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for coming. It's great to see
you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to know what I'm doing?
Studying, that's what.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I run a pet shop, so I need to know all
I can about cats, dogs, horses and other
animals.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, do you remember how you let me
take care of your chickens on your farm,
before we started dating?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That was when I realized that I knew
almost nothing about keeping birds as
pets.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
So I've started to read all sorts of
books about animals, including birds.
Just books aren't enough, though.
<PAGE>
The more I read the more I've been made
to realize that I just don't know
enough.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's pathetic that I run a pet store but
there's all this stuff I don't know 
about pets.

Rod is trying hard but he's down about
something. What should I say to him?
I'll study with you
I'll teach you
Try looking after some animals
You're pathetic

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'll help me with my studies?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Along with you... I mean, with you at my
side, I think I can do even better.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's do this thing, then! Come sit
beside me and let's read this book
together, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Are you sure?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So can we get started? Can we start with
the chickens?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So there's this... and then...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So what happens if... this is like this?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You don't know, <MYNAME>? What can we do,
then?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Neil might know! I'll go and ask him
about it right away. Do you want to come
along, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, I'll go. Come and see me later
<MYNAME>.

It looks like Rod has cheered up a
little. There's things to be learnt from
him.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You're right. A picture is worth a
thousand words.
<PAGE>
Just like with the chickens, actually
trying it is the best way to do it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know a guy who works in a zoo. I'll
ask him if maybe I can try looking after
some different animals.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm going to do whatever
I can, and be positive about it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I didn't really want you to see me like
this, to be honest.
<PAGE>
But with you telling me hang in there,
to keep on trying...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's great. I'm really, really happy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How about we start by looking after the
animals in your farm again?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Let's go and get
started!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uwah. Having my girlfriend say that
really magnifies the hurt! Not sure if I
can take any more!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I guess that's the price I pay. I'm
going to mend my ways, you'll see! I'll
learn all I can!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm going to do my
best from now on.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Your words have had a powerful effect on
me. A damaging effect! I think I'm about
to start crying...

He's recovered, but maybe I went a
little too far. Sorry, Rod!
